description: Defines data classes and enums for filter criteria, including range constraints and attributes such as race, hair color, and religion, for a Flutter project.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: Represents a simple numeric range with minimum and maximum values.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: Encapsulates filter criteria including ranges and sets of attributes such as race, hair color, and religion.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the object with optional updated fields.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Overrides equality operator to compare contents.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Generates a hash code based on object fields.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the object.
